# netbird_identity_provider (Data Source)

Read Identity Provider settings, see [NetBird Docs](https://docs.netbird.io/selfhosted/identity-providers) for more information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve by id
data "netbird_identity_provider" "example" {
  id = "d5j1qnafadhs73e9bd00"
}

# Retrieve by name
data "netbird_identity_provider" "example" {
  name = "example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identity provider ID
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the identity provider

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) OAuth2 client ID
- `issuer` (String) OIDC issuer URL
- `type` (String) Type of identity provider (entra, google, microsoft, oidc, okta, pocketid, zitadel)
